title: Once and For All
description: What happens when 180 pounds of football star collides with 105 pounds of art geek?An ancient curse springs to life, of course.Phoebe Campbell is anything but popular. Todd Miller is the epitome of the high school jock. Their socially opposite worlds collide when they are paired to work together on a project for art class. Attempting to cooperate for the sake of their assignment, Todd and Phoebe begin to look past preconceived notions and see each other for who they truly are. As genuine feelings begin to develop between them, they find themselves plagued by dangerous shape-shifting episodes and unexplained telepathic connections. In order to stop the mysterious occurrences, Phoebe and Todd are forced into a mission to uncover the truth. In their quest, they discover unsettling stories that hint at a previous existence, and also clues to an ancient curse that has never been broken.Can they learn to love each other despite the typical high school social expectations? And will their love be the key that breaks the ancient curse once and for all?
author: Amy Durham
